page.title: 082nd Day.The life of a street
page.content: The strange day. ---------------- The sun shines high, up above. Kids with dripping lollies running, to parents, waiting for the yell."Mummy, Daddy, my lollies broke, from my stick buy me another one". The child climbs in to the pushchair and they move on. Behind them a girl with long blonde hair, swiftly moving, softly treading, knowing something, but what she knows will never be told to another soul. The stains crease her face, but the cheeky grin banishes them. She looks and sees a tall, old man, she runs and is swung into the arms of the man, a parent she has never seen. The man, he grins a tired smile and thinks of what might have been.
